translation.welcome: One stop solution to find reliable domestic helpers
translation.welcomeContent: Online Platform Matching Helpers And Employers
translation.term_condition: By continuing you accept our standard Terms and conditions and our Privacy policy.
translation.recruiterTitle: Over 80,000 recruiters use HelperDoc to modernize their hiring
translation.whoWeAreHeader: We help job seekers and employers find their true perfect match
translation.whoWeAreContent: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation .
translation.search_content: for job listings that match you
translation.helper_section_content: They Are Now Looking For A Job And Are Near You!
translation.feature_job_section_content: Find The Families They Are Looking For Helpers
translation.testimonials_content: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form.
translation.news_letter_content: Job Searching Just Got Easy. Use Jobtex to run a hiring site and earn money in the process!
translation.copy_right: Â© 2024 Domestic Doc. All Rights Reserved.
translation.valid_email_msg: Please enter a valid email address
translation.mobile_min_msg: Mobile number must be at least 10 digits long
translation.mobile_max_msg: Mobile number must be at most 10 digits long
translation.confirm_password_match: Passwords and confirm password must match
translation.password_min_msg: Password must be at least 6 digits long.
translation.strong_password_msg: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, and one special character
translation.helper_disc: Get a chance to freely choose your future employer and be hired.
translation.employer_disc: Be in touch with thousands of candidates and connect with the right one.
translation.agency_disc: Be in touch with thousands of candidates and connect with the right one.
translation.helper_registration_process: The whole registration process takes around 10 - 20 minutes to finish.
translation.fill_working_experience: Please fill in all working experiences you have. You will have a higher chance of being contacted and hired.
translation.before_you_start: Before you start, PLEASE CONFIRM THE FOLLOWING DECLARATIONS
translation.do_not_hide: PLEASE DO NOT LIE AND HIDE YOUR RECORD AS WE WILL FIND OUT EVENTUALLY.
translation.step1_question_1: Have you ever changed your name before
translation.step1_question_2: Have you been refused entry into, deported from, removed from or required to leave Any Country
translation.step1_question_3: Have you been refused a visa for entry into any following Place
translation.step1_question_4: Have you been involved in any court case in any country?
translation.step1_question_4_sub_question: Please explain the details and result
translation.step1_question_5: What is the reason you want to work aboard. Are you committed to go through the process if you are confirmed hired?
translation.valid_mobile_number_msg: Please enter a valid mobile number
translation.notification_sub_title: Every job notification you've ever received.
translation.confirm_delete_notification_message: Are you sure, you want to delete this notification?
translation.step4_question_2: Have you been vaccinated against the COVID-19 disease?
translation.step4_question_4: Can you get along with dogs, cats, or other pets?
translation.step4_question_5: Are you comfortable working with co-helpers?
translation.step4_question_6: Are you willing to take days off that are not on Sundays sometimes?
translation.step4_question_7: Are you willing to accept monetary compensation to work on your holidays?
translation.step4_question_8: Do you accept to work in the employer's house equipped with a camera recording system (for security purposes)?
translation.step4_question_9: Are you willing to return home no later than the time set by your employer on your holiday?
translation.upload_photo_label: Upload a photo of yourself which shows your face clearly with a smile, wearing clean white shirt and with clean background. No heavy make-up, no sunglasses, no children
translation.upload_self_intro_video: Please input your YouTube video link for your own self-intro video. If you are uncertain the step, please contact our support for your self-intro video link
translation.invalid_youtube_link: Please enter a valid youtube link
